project.name: Hera QA Platform
project.scope: Unified test orchestration, flaky test analytics

sections.title: Introduction & Context Setting
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee's understanding of the Hera QA Platform project, their role, and alignment with company policies and values.
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your role as QA Lead within the Hera QA Platform initiative?
How does the Hera QA Platform align with Novereon Systems' mission and values, especially 'Evidence over Hype'?
Which policies, such as POL-QA-014, are most relevant to your current work?

sections.title: Test Strategy & Risk-Based Approach
sections.goal: Explore the interviewee's approach to designing and implementing a risk-based testing strategy for the Hera QA Platform.
sample_questions: How have you applied POL-QA-014 Risk-Based Testing & Traceability in this project?
What factors do you consider when prioritizing test cases for unified orchestration?
Can you walk me through how you handle flaky test analytics to minimize false positives?

sections.title: Traceability & Cross-System Dependencies
sections.goal: Understand how the QA strategy ensures traceability across multiple subsystems and integrates with other portfolio projects.
sample_questions: How do you maintain traceability between requirements, tests, and defects in Hera?
Can you give an example where a change in another project, such as Helios Datalake or Orion Edge Gateway, impacted your QA scope?
What tools or runbooks, like RB-QA-051, support you in managing these dependencies?

sections.title: Non-Trivial Multi-Hop Linkage
sections.goal: Dive into a scenario where multiple subsystems required coordinated QA efforts, ensuring risk-based priorities were maintained.
sample_questions: Describe a situation where a flaky test in Hera revealed an upstream data integrity issue in Helios Datalake.
How did you coordinate with other teams to resolve this while keeping Hera's release on track?
What evidence or metrics did you rely on to justify deferring or blocking a release?

sections.title: Decision-Making & Trade-offs
sections.goal: Assess the interviewee's ability to make informed trade-offs under constraints, using evidence from runbooks, SLAs, and tickets.
sample_questions: Can you share a decision where you had to balance speed of delivery with test coverage?
What risks did you identify and how did you mitigate them?
How did you document and communicate this decision to stakeholders?

sections.title: Closing & Reflection
sections.goal: Summarize key learnings, evaluate process effectiveness, and identify areas for improvement.
sample_questions: Looking back, what would you change in your QA strategy for Hera?
How do you measure the success of risk-based testing in this context?
What advice would you give to a new QA Lead joining Novereon Systems?
